Class
Enumerator
In: lib/core/facets/to_hash.rb
Parent: Object
Methods
to_h
Public Instance methods
to_h(mode=nil)

Convert an Enumerator object directly into a hash. 

  e3 = [[1,:a],[2,:b],[3,:c]].to_enum
  e3.to_h #=> { 1=>:a, 2=>:b, 3=>:c }

  e1 = [1,2,3,4,5].to_enum
  e1.to_h  #=> {5=>nil, 1=>2, 3=>4}

  e2 = [1,2,1,3,1,5].to_enum
  e2.to_h #=> {1=>5}

    def to_h(mode=nil)
      to_a.to_h(mode)
    end
